User Story: As a Voter, I want to cast my vote online, so that I can participate in elections.
As an Admin, I want to manage candidate profiles, so that I can organize the election.
As a Moderator, I want to verify voter identities, so that I can ensure fair elections.
As a Candidate, I want to view election results, so that I can see how I performed.
As a Donor, I want to browse fundraising campaigns, so that I can contribute to causes I care about.
As a Campaign Creator, I want to create a fundraising campaign, so that I can raise funds for my project.
As an Admin, I want to manage campaigns, so that I can ensure compliance with platform rules.
As a Donor, I want to track my donations, so that I can see how my contributions are being used.
As a funding body, I want to be reassured that researchers I fund have robust archival plans for their data, so that I can be sure that funding them is a worthwhile investment.
As a data reuser, I want to view an example citation for a dataset, so that I can reference it correctly.
As a collection curator, I want to set a date after which data will expire and be deleted or hidden, so that outdated or sensitive data is properly managed.
As a repository manager, I want to track who is financially responsible for each item in the repository, so that billing and ownership accountability can be maintained.
As a Digital Records Archivist, I want to batch ingest ETDs received from ProQuest, so that large-scale electronic theses and dissertations can be efficiently added to the repository.
As a collection curator, I want to move items from one collection to another, so that items can be reassigned to the most appropriate collection.
As a repository admin, I want to expose repository contents via OAI-PMH, so that metadata can be harvested by external services.
As a depositor, I want to get feedback post-ingest if files do not conform to format specifications, so that I can correct any issues before finalizing the submission.
As a faculty member, I want to manage members of my classes in the repository dashboard, so that I can grant submission permissions and track student submissions easily.
As a Digital Records Archivist, I want to edit the length of embargoes, so that restricted items can be made available at the appropriate time.
As a collection curator, I want to restrict access to my collection or items to Duke IP addresses, so that only authorized users can access certain materials.
As a superuser, I want to enter and exit the superuser scope, so that I can perform administrative actions without being permanently in an elevated role.
As a Cornell faculty member, I want to upload data to the repository and associate it with a publication, so that I receive attribution for my data as well as my publications.
As a developer, I want to have the subdomain beta.nsf.gov set up, so that I can deploy a beta site to it.
As a user researcher, I want to test the user research plan, so that I ensure the in-person interviews are effective and capturing the right information.
As a designer, I want to create a mood board to aid with visual design concepts for the nsf.gov website, so that we can discuss different design ideas with stakeholders.
As a team member, I want to understand how work moves between UX/content, visual design, and front-end development for a sprint cycle, so that we can plan our workflow efficiently.
As an NSF employee, I want to narrow down CMS options and identify key considerations, so that we can make an informed decision on a content management system.
As a workshop attendee, I want to see a summary of major findings from the event, so that I can understand the key takeaways and next steps.
As a stakeholder, I want to see the results of user research, so that I can determine if the CMS is the right fit for my needs.
As a site administrator, I want to understand how other similar organizations handle content, so that I can make informed decisions about what works well.
As a Public User, I want to search for information, so that I can obtain publicly available details concerning properties, county services, and processes.
As an Applicant, I want to check the status of a transaction, so that I can understand where my service request is in the process, including fees, plan reviews, permits, or inspections.
As a Staff Member, I want to apply a hold on an application, so that I can prevent progression through the workflow until the issue is resolved.
As a Planning Staff Member, I want to generate planning-related reports, so that I can access, analyze, and export the needed information in my requested format.
As a Zoning Staff Member, I want to issue zoning-related permits, so that I can satisfy an applicant's request for a service that complies with the Zoning Ordinance.

As a Plan Review Staff Member, I want to track the completion of required plan reviews, so that I can ensure all tasks are completed, results are sent to the applicant, and downstream steps are initiated.
As a Development Staff Member, I want to issue a development-related permit, so that I can grant the applicant permission to begin work.
As an Inspection Supervisor, I want to manage inspector workloads, so that I can meet service level and quality requirements.
As an Enforcement Staff Member, I want to issue a notice of violation, so that I can provide formal communication to the responsible party.
As a Technical Staff Member, I want to update the GIS property management system, so that I can ensure accurate parcel data is maintained after property splits or merges.
As a site member, I want to describe myself on my own page in a semi-structured way, so that others can learn about me.
As a site member, I want to fill out an application to become a Certified Scrum Practitioner, so that I can earn that designation.
As a Trainer, I want to include additional details in my profile page about me, so that others can learn about me and decide if I am the right trainer for them.
As a trainer, I want to list my upcoming classes in my profile and include a link to a detailed page about each, so that prospective attendees can find my courses.
As a site member, I want to search for profiles based on a few fields, so that I can find others I might want to connect with.
As a site member, I want to mark my email address as private even if the rest of my profile is not, so that no one can contact me without my permission.
As a site editor, I want to set the following dates on a news item: Start Publishing Date, Old News Date, Stop Publishing Date, so that articles are published on and through appropriate dates.
As a trainer, I want to create a new course or event, so that site visitors can see it and register.
As a recruiter, I want to post a help-wanted ad, so that I can attract candidates.
As a site member, I want to have full access to all articles, so that there is a benefit to being a member.
As a site visitor, I want to see a trainer's rating, so that I can choose a course from an appropriate trainer.
As a member, I want to receive a reminder and a link, so that I can renew my membership on time.
As a Publisher, I want to publish a dataset, so that I can share it publicly with everyone.
As a Publisher, I want to import my data package into the registry, so that my data has a permanent online home.
As a Consumer, I want to know that the data I am downloading is reliable, so that I don't have to check it manually.
As a Consumer, I want to search for data packages based on descriptions, so that I can find relevant ones.
As a Data Analyst, I want to update previously downloaded data packages, so that I can work with recent data.
As a Developer, I want to use a data package as a Node.js library, so that I can integrate it with my project.
As a Data Publishing User, I want to edit a dataset I have published, so that I can correct or enhance data.
As a Platform Administrator, I want to view all datasets published by users, so that I can manage them.
As a Data Consuming User, I want to filter, sort, and aggregate data by dimensions, so that I can analyze trends.
As an API User, I want to dynamically request polygons based on queries, so that I can provide matching maps.
As a Data Publishing User, I want to import data from Google Sheets, so that I avoid manual conversions.
As an API User, I want to normalize measures by GDP, so that I can analyze economic context.
As a Data Consuming User, I want to download an image of a view state, so that I can use it offline.
As a Data Publishing User, I want to validate my CSV file before publishing, so that I can fix issues early.
As a Visitor, I want to sign up via GitHub or Google, so that I avoid manual registration.
As an Admin, I want to invite someone to join the platform, so that they can contribute.
As an Owner, I want to remove a user from my publisher, so that they lose edit permissions.
As an Application Administrator, I want to reset a user's password, so that they regain account access.
As a User, I want to authenticate using LDAP, so that I log in with my org credentials.
As an Authenticated User, I want to access contextual help links, so that I find guidance quickly.
As an Admin, I want to see platform usage metrics (users, API calls, downloads), so that I monitor performance.
As a Repository Manager, I want to manage archival descriptions, so that records stay organized.
As an Archivist, I want to import Accessions data in CSV, so that I add bulk records efficiently.
As an Archivist, I want to edit Rights Management statements, so that I track intellectual property.
As a Systems Administrator, I want to control the demo database location, so that I ensure backups.
As an Archivist, I want to assign location info to containers, so that I track physical storage.
As a Digital Records Archivist, I want to batch ingest ETDs from ProQuest, so that I add theses at scale.
As a Collection Curator, I want to move items between collections, so that they are reassigned properly.
As a Repository Admin, I want to expose contents via OAI-PMH, so that metadata is harvestable.
As a Depositor, I want feedback on non-compliant files post-ingest, so that I can fix issues.
As a Faculty Member, I want to manage class members in the repository, so that I control submissions.
As an Anonymous User, I want to sign up for the BADCamp newsletter, so that I stay updated.
As a Sponsor, I want to link BADCamp attendees to my page, so that I showcase attendance.
As an Administrator, I want to assign sponsors to events, so that they are featured on sponsor pages.
As a Summit Coordinator, I want to list sponsors for my summit, so that they feel rewarded.
As an Authenticated User, I want to edit my session, so that I correct mistakes.
As an OlderPerson, I want a wake-up call from ALFRED checking if I'm okay, so that I feel safe.
As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED for navigation, so that I move independently.
As an OlderPerson, I want medicine reminders from ALFRED, so that I don't forget doses.
As an OlderPerson, I want ALFRED to detect falls and send alerts, so that I get help fast.
As a Medical Caregiver, I want to check if patients took medicine, so that I ensure adherence.
As a Researcher, I want to view a finding aid for a collection, so that I understand its contents.
As a Researcher, I want updates when new works are published, so that I stay informed.
As a Researcher, I want to specify data storage locations, so that it remains accessible long-term.
As a PI, I want to record Data Management Plan details, so that Ethics Committees can review compliance.
As a Camp Administrator, I want to schedule camper activities, so that workers track locations.
As a Parent, I want to track my child's camp schedule, so that I have peace of mind.
As a Camp Worker, I want to report supply shortages, so that managers can restock.
As a Camp Administrator, I want to give bi-weekly feedback to parents, so that they know child progress.
As a User, I want to find nearby recycling facilities by zip code, so that I dispose waste responsibly.
As a User, I want to see a map of public recycling bins, so that I locate them easily.
As a User, I want to upload my weekly schedule, so that I get recycling center recommendations.
As a User, I want to browse eco-friendly facilities, so that I ensure responsible waste disposal.

As a Customer, I want to transfer funds...
